sentences.en: Examine the painful area carefully in an effort to localize the most tender point.

sentences.en: Few officers thought that a German-Czech war could be localized.

sentences.en: Firms must also be careful to localize at the correct pace.

It is unlikely to localize this disease.

sentences.en: Q: Are there plans to localize the game in Spanish?
